network
Interface Simulator.NodeBuilder

Enclosing interface:
Simulator
public static interface Simulator.NodeBuilder

A constructor object for Node objects.

Author:
Luke Maurer
See Also:
Simulator.buildNode()

Method Summary
 Simulator.NodeBuilder connections(Node... nodes)
          Connect this node to all the given nodes initially.
 Node create()
          Create the node as parameterized.
 Simulator.NodeBuilder kernel(Kernel kernel)
          Specify the kernel to use for this node.

          Give the node a name.
 

Method Detail

name

Simulator.NodeBuilder name(String name)
Give the node a name. By default, an autogenerated name is used.

Parameters:
name - Any string to be used as a name. Used mostly for display purposes; may also affect logger names. Need not be unique.
Returns:
This node builder.

kernel

Simulator.NodeBuilder kernel(Kernel kernel)
Specify the kernel to use for this node.

Parameters:
kernel - The node's kernel. MUST NOT be shared with any other node.
Returns:
This node builder.

connections

Simulator.NodeBuilder connections(Node... nodes)
Connect this node to all the given nodes initially. Cumultative with other calls to this method.

Parameters:
nodes - The nodes to connect to.
Returns:
This node builder.

create

Node create()
Create the node as parameterized. This node builder MUST NOT be reused.

Returns:
The node created by this builder.
